name: @rucken/cli
description: Console tools for create and build Angular7+ and NestJS application based on Rucken template

scripts.prepack: rimraf lib && tsc && oclif-dev manifest && npm shrinkwrap
scripts.run-new:angular: node ./bin/run new:angular test/fixtures/angular-new -n demo -u demo -e demo@demo.demo
scripts.run-entity:angular: node ./bin/run entity:angular test/fixtures/angular-entity -n demo -u demo -e demo@demo.demo -f [name,title]
scripts.run-new:nestjs: node ./bin/run new:nestjs test/fixtures/nestjs-new -n demo -u demo -e demo@demo.demo
scripts.run-entity:nestjs: node ./bin/run entity:nestjs test/fixtures/nestjs-entity -n demo -u demo -e demo@demo.demo -f [name,title] --time=1533634559618
scripts.run-new: node ./bin/run new test/fixtures/new -n demo -u demo -e demo@demo.demo
scripts.run-entity:create-app: node ./bin/run new test/fixtures/entity -n demo -u demo -e demo@demo.demo
scripts.run-entity:create-entity: node ./bin/run entity test/fixtures/entity -n demo -u demo -e demo@demo.demo -f [name,title] --time=1533634559618
scripts.run-generators: run-s run-new:angular run-entity:angular run-new:nestjs run-entity:nestjs run-new run-entity
scripts.clear-generators-outputs: rimraf test/fixtures/angular-new test/fixtures/angular-entity test/fixtures/nestjs-new test/fixtures/nestjs-entity test/fixtures/new test/fixtures/entity
